mapper.sql: CATEGORY_ID, PARENT_ID, CATEGORY_NAME, CATEGORY_DESC, METADATA_ID, CATEGORY_KEY, DOMAIN, ORDER_KEY
mapper.select:
select
from sec_resource_category where 1 = 1 order by CATEGORY_ID desc
mapper.delete: delete from sec_resource_category where CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId, jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into sec_resource_category(CATEGORY_ID, PARENT_ID, CATEGORY_NAME, CATEGORY_DESC, METADATA_ID, CATEGORY_KEY, DOMAIN, ORDER_KEY ) values (#{categoryId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{parentId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{categoryName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{metadataId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{domain, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderKey, jdbcType=INTEGER} )

insert into sec_resource_category
CATEGORY_ID,
PARENT_ID,
CATEGORY_NAME,
CATEGORY_DESC,
METADATA_ID,
CATEGORY_KEY,
DOMAIN,
ORDER_KEY,

mapper.update: update sec_resource_category set CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, PARENT_ID = #{parentId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, CATEGORY_NAME = #{categoryName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CATEGORY_DESC = #{categoryDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, METADATA_ID = #{metadataId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CATEGORY_KEY = #{categoryKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DOMAIN = #{domain, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_KEY = #{orderKey, jdbcType=INTEGER} where CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId, jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sec_resource_category
CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId, jdbcType=BIGINT},
PARENT_ID = #{parentId, jdbcType=BIGINT},
CATEGORY_NAME = #{categoryName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CATEGORY_DESC = #{categoryDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
METADATA_ID = #{metadataId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CATEGORY_KEY = #{categoryKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId, jdbcType=BIGINT}
